name: Sanrio Danshi: Watashi, Koi Wo, Shirimashita
storyline:
The busy classroom.
The sunlight shining in the hall way.
The time after school that you still knew nothing about.

One day when the love-granting “tree of promises” sways in the wind, there was an unexpected encounter–“We are Sanrio Boys”.

Ever since you met the Sanrio Boys, everyday was fun, heart-throbbing, and a bit heart-wrenching.

The loud heart-beat, the sentiments, they taught you everything.

Yes..—meeting the Sanrio Boys was the start of a sparkling love.
summary: The iOS and Android game, Sanrio Danshi ~Watashi, Koi Wo, Shirimashita.~ , invites players to date their favorite Sanrio-loving boy.
